snippet.title: More than 6,300 stores are shutting down -- here's the full list
snippet.content:
Retailers are closing thousands of stores following years of declines in sales and customer traffic. We compiled a list of the 6,375 closures that have been announced so far in 2017. Some retailers have released lists of which of their locations will be closing. To find out if a store near you is shutting down, click on the retailers in the following list:
Business Insider Emails & Alerts
Site highlights each day to your inbox.
